name: fitness-management-system
description: Full Stack Fitness Management System - Monorepo

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: cd backend && ./mvnw clean && cd ../frontend && npm run clean
